all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And now, after the many testimonies which have been given of him, this is the testimony, last of all, which we give of him: That he lives!
Doctrine and Covenants 76:22
Quote of the Day
"Discipleship is a deliberate journey that we take to become transformed through the Lord’s atoning sacrifice and His enabling power."
Elder Michael B. Strong | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
